column2: Fresh troops for your §YMercenary Company§! have arrived!
Some of our men have scaled the walls with our ladders!
A wall segment has been breached by our catapult!
One of the gates has been breached by our ram!
A wall segment has been breached by our bricole!
Some of our men have scaled the walls with our siege towers!
Some of their men have been impaled by our ballistas!
A wall segment has been breached by our trebuchet!
A wall segment has been breached by our cannon!
We have destroyed their siege towers!
